content.raw: 3) The standpipe does not have a physical opening (even though it has a visual opening) which prevents physical feedback during hose alignment. A description of how the alignment process is supposed to work would be useful as well (which direction does the hose need to be rotated in, what are the criteria for the screw joint to be created, etc.).
content.html: 3) The standpipe does not have a physical opening (even though it has a visual opening) which prevents physical feedback during hose alignment. A description of how the alignment process is supposed to work would be useful as well (which direction does the hose need to be rotated in, what are the criteria for the screw joint to be created, etc.).
